sentences.english: That's- God, she make one with our names on it?
sentences.chinese: 真神她能把我們的名字印在上面嗎？

sentences.english: Worshiping the true God is only way to be blessed.
sentences.chinese: 只有尊崇獨一的真神纔會蒙福。

sentences.english: Likewise, visuals can lead to erroneous ideas about the triune God.
sentences.chinese: 同樣地，圖像會誤導人對三一真神持錯誤觀念。

sentences.english: All worshiping and praising the eternal God.
sentences.chinese: 都一同敬拜稱頌永生真神。

sentences.english: Our Father, which art in heaven, hallowed be Thy name.
sentences.chinese: 哦，天父，天上的真神，願尊禰名爲聖。

sentences.english: You still pray to the one true God, no matter how long you live in Babylon.
sentences.chinese: 不管你在巴比倫住了多久，你依舊向唯一的真神禱告。

sentences.english: From God our heavenly Father a blessed angel came.
sentences.chinese: 哦，天父，天上的真神，願尊禰名爲聖。

sentences.english: Prayer and praising all men raising, Worship Him, God on high.
sentences.chinese: 願萬人來禱告頌讚，朝拜真神在天。

sentences.english: He loves you even when you reject Him.
sentences.chinese: 縱然你拒絕這位真神，祂仍然愛你。

sentences.english: It clearly teaches that the one true God is sovereign over all that exists.
sentences.chinese: 它清楚地教導了這位獨一真神的主權高於一切。

sentences.english: To the One True Divinity This I AM.
sentences.chinese: 我是全一真神的一個面貌。

sentences.english: Run to the Lord who is truly God and give yourself to him.
sentences.chinese: 奔向那位真神之主，把你自己交託給祂。

sentences.english: How many persons does the one true God reveal himself as?
sentences.chinese: 這位獨一真神向多少人彰顯他自己？

sentences.english: But this was a challenge hurled in the face of Almighty God. Belshazzar had reached P.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他這個狂妄的舉動大大觸怒了全能的真神。

sentences.english: They came to worship the one and only God who had come in human body.
sentences.chinese: 他們前來敬拜那位道成肉身，唯一的真神。

sentences.english: By crucifixion and the sepulchre came the throne and the palace of the Eternal God.
sentences.chinese: 永生真神的寶座和宮殿，得自十字架和墳墓。

definition: god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
Holy Son/Jesus Christ/God the Son (in the Christian Trinity)
Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture)/Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)
feudal term of praise for ruler, king or emperor/general term for saint in former times/term for God during the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom 太平天國|太平天国/Holy Spirit (in Christian Trinity)
